info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 3:55PM CDT until June 12 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR
info.description:
TORLZK
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Southwestern White County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas...
* Until 415 PM CDT.
* At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Little Rock AFB, moving northeast at 35 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Macon... Old Austin... El Paso... Otto... Parnell... Cabot... Beebe... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Jacksonville... South Bend... Olmstead... Little Rock AFB... Sylvania... Gibson... Vilonia...
info.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 4:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 4:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner, AR; Lonoke, AR; Pulaski, AR; White, AR

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 4:15 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 4:15 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner, AR; Lonoke, AR; Pulaski, AR; White, AR
